name: Espresso
description: A concentrated shot of coffee with rich crema.

name: Double Espresso
description: Two shots of espresso for an extra kick.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a lighter taste.

name: Long Black
description: Hot water with espresso poured on top, preserving crema.

name: Cappuccino
description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam.

name: Latte
description: Espresso with lots of steamed milk and a thin layer of foam.

name: Flat White
description: Espresso with microfoam milk, stronger than a latte.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso marked with a dollop of foamed milk.

name: Cortado
description: Equal parts espresso and warm milk to cut the acidity.

name: Mocha
description: Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream.

name: Vanilla Latte
description: Classic latte sweetened with vanilla syrup.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Vanilla-flavored milk marked with espresso and caramel drizzle.

name: White Chocolate Mocha
description: Sweet mocha made with white chocolate sauce.

name: Iced Americano
description: Espresso poured over ice and cold water.

name: Iced Latte
description: Espresso with cold milk over ice.

name: Cold Brew
description: Coffee steeped in cold water for 12-24 hours.

name: Cold Brew Concentrate
description: Strong cold brew meant to be diluted.

name: Nitro Cold Brew
description: Cold brew infused with nitrogen for a creamy texture.

name: Iced Mocha
description: Chocolate espresso drink served over ice.

name: Frappuccino
description: Blended coffee drink with ice and milk.

name: French Press Coffee
description: Full-bodied coffee made with immersion brewing.

name: Pour Over
description: Clean, bright coffee made with manual drip method.

name: Chemex
description: Pour over with thick filter for exceptionally clean cup.

name: AeroPress
description: Versatile brewing method with smooth results.

name: Affogato
description: Espresso poured over vanilla ice cream.

name: Irish Coffee
description: Coffee with Irish whiskey and cream.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte

name: Oat Milk Latte

name: Red Eye

name: Black Eye

name: Vienna Coffee
description: Strong coffee topped with whipped cream.
